settings.pretext:
THE UK'S LARGEST COLLECTION OF ANTIQUE FURNITURE, ARCHITECTURE & DECORATIVE OBJECTS FROM INDIA, CHINA, TIBET, JAPAN & MONGOLIA. 

INDIGO: A FAMILY BUSINESS WITH OVER 35 YEARS OF EXPERIENCE
Visit our Wiltshire Showrooms & Warehouse. An "Aladdin's Cave" of Oriental Art & Antiques.
